name: querySetRow
description: Adds a row to a query, either by struct or array

params.name: query
params.description: The query object on which to set the row

params.name: rowNumber
params.description: Position of the row to be updated. If not provided or set to 0, a new row is added.

params.name: rowData
params.description: A struct or array containing the row data

examples.title: Builds a simple query using queryNew and querySetRow
examples.description: Sets third row of query overwriting news entry

examples.title: Builds a simple query using queryNew and someQuery.setRow member syntax
examples.description: Sets third row of query overwriting news entry
